title: Twitch can change the terms of licence at any time, and notice of the changes by emailing you.

tosdr.tldr:
"Twitch reserves the right to change these Terms of Service at any time at our discretion." [...]
"Your continued use of the Twitch Services after changes to these Terms of Service take effect will constitute your acceptance of the changes. If you do not agree to a change, you must stop using the Twitch Services."
